description:
This canyon is described in limited detail in Canyons Near Sydney by Rick Jamieson. Help the Australian canyoning community by contributing track notes to ropewiki.com

Bullring Creek, note its name... Bullring Creek... not Bullring Canyon ;o)

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape

The canyon is in Wollemi National Park, you can view alerts here: https://www.nationalparks.nsw.gov.au/visit-a-park/parks/wollemi-national-park/local-alerts

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

  • David Noble : Bull Ring Creek - Annie Rowan Creek - Canyon Exploration - 20 - 21 November 1976
  • YouTube.com : Richard Pattison, Lower Wolgan Canyons movie. Bullring Creek at 2:16.


Background

The first recorded descent was by David Noble & Martin Darling on 20 November 1976. Photos of the descent can be seen here: https://www.david-noble.net/canyoning/wolgan/wolgancanyons.html

Published by David Noble in his "Wolgan Canyons Sketch Map" of 1988.
name: Bull Ring
